job.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer, Customer Experience (Remote)
job.description: strongstrongAt Shipt we are transforming the grocery shopping experience and giving time back to consumers Shipt shoppers handpick fresh groceries and household essentials then deliver them to your door in as little as one hourstrongstrongstrongstrong Were searching for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to drive the development and deployment of key machine learning features and services such as customer segmentation churn prediction shopping personalization and recommendation This person will lead and experience firsthand how our MLE team transforms machine learning models and algorithms into AI products for our customers shoppers and partners around the nation brbrstrongstrongstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Bring strong technical expertise and develop deploy and monitor machine learning and datadriven services on Google Cloud Platform GCP in the areas of customer behavior loyalty and engagement search performance profitability etc lili Lead and define best practices for robust and efficient machine learning service development that include data pipeline development and automation model versioning and deployment machine learning feature testing lili Design and manage CICD pipelines for our machine learning product deployment lili Collaborate with a crossfunctional team of Data Science Engineering Product Marketing etc to deliver AI services with quality efficiency security and affordability lili Contribute to the machine learning engineering roadmap and priorities within your area of ownership and projects brliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulliA bachelors masters or doctorate degree in Computer Engineering or Computer Science  and a minimum of 2 years of machine learning and data science industry experience lili Strong expertise in developing and deploying machine learning models in production lili Solid understandings of machine learning software development and statistical modeling liliProficiency in Python and GCP machine learning platformlili Experience with Python API development framework such as FastAPI Django or Flask lili Experience with cloud computing services or platforms GCP preferred Ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic teambased environment lili Strong SQL skills we use Snowflake Postgres and Redshift lili Experience with demo UI development with tools like Python Dash or R Shiny liliFamiliarity with version control and peer code review systems lili Demonstrated ability to learn and embrace new technologies applications and solutions lili Experience as a technical lead and passion for mentoring lili Strong written and verbal communication skills and the ability to explain technical topics especially ML results and applications to data scientists engineers and business partners brliulstrongNice To Haves brstrongulli Experience with event instrumentation lili Experience with batch processing frameworks lili Experience with RliliFamiliarity with more than one cloud computing environment AWS Azure GCPlili Familiarity with ondemand andor multisided marketplaces liliFamiliarity with causal inference and experimentation
